sentences.en: Allow an extra 10-15 min if you prefer lamb well done.
sentences.cn: 如果想让羊羔肉完全熟透还需要再煮10到15分钟。

sentences.en: Allow for some shrinkage in both length and width.
sentences.cn: 长、宽上都预留出一定的缩水量。

sentences.en: Allow the loaves to rise until just about double in size.
sentences.cn: 让面包发酵到刚好是原来的两倍左右。

sentences.en: Don't allow a minor irritation in the workplace to mar your ambitions.
sentences.cn: 不要让工作中的一点烦心事打击了你的雄心抱负。

sentences.en: Free gifts are dispatched separately so please allow 28 days for delivery.
sentences.cn: 赠品会分开发送，所以请预留28天的送货期。

sentences.en: He did not allow his preconceptions to compromise his scientific work.
sentences.cn: 他不允许自己的先入之见破坏自己的科学工作。

sentences.en: He promised to allow justice to run its course unimpeded.
sentences.cn: 他承诺要让司法正义不受阻碍地得到伸张。

sentences.en: How could you allow him to do something like that?
sentences.cn: 你怎么会允许他做那样的事？

sentences.en: Lower the heat and allow the omelet to set on the bottom.
sentences.cn: 关小火让煎蛋的下面凝固。

sentences.en: The film studio grudgingly agreed to allow him to continue working.
sentences.cn: 这家电影公司勉强同意让他继续工作。

sentences.en: Their wages do, however, allow them a degree of independence.
sentences.cn: 不过，他们的工资确实给了他们一定的独立。

sentences.en: They will not allow your more way-out ideas to pass unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 他们不会放过你这些古怪的念头的。

sentences.en: This licence would not allow him to trade as a plc.
sentences.cn: 这个许可证并不能让他以公开股份有限公司的名义从事贸易。

sentences.en: Warehouse clubs allow members to buy goods at wholesale prices.
sentences.cn: 仓储式会员店允许会员以批发价购买商品。

sentences.en: We don’t allow diving in the pool.
You have to allow for a certain amount of error.
sentences.cn: 你必须将一定量的误差考虑在内。

words.tran_cn: 许可的；正当的；可承认的；可获宽免

trans.tran_cn: 允许，给予，使有可能，留出，给出，接受，同意
trans.tran_en: to let someone do or have something, or let something happen

trans.tran_cn: 考虑到， 顾及； 体谅
